info.brief_description: Recreating my famous iCarly giantess story!
info.description:
I decided to bring back my icarly giantess story again. I've received so many complaints when I deleted it I decided I should bring it back.


Rules:

1. Of course no male giants

2. Carly or Sam one of them always has to be alive. If Carly dies, Sam must live, and if Sam dies Carly must live.

3. Use grammar and such. Makes the story much more enjoyable.


Aside from that you can add whatever you want unless otherwise told. ^^.
